attributes.action: Limit legal aid claims to no more than 2 claims per life time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legal aid costs the honest tax payer millions per year.  Legal aid is a wonderful facility but unlimited legal aid encourages serial criminality.  They don't deserve a third opportunity to waste tax payers money.

Limit the number of claims to 2 per person per lifetime.  Serial offenders may then think about the consequence of their actions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
